mapper.select: SELECT p.product_name as, p.product_model, c.contract_price FROM basket b JOIN contract c ON b.contract_id = c.contract_id AND b.product_id = c.product_id JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (user_id, contract_id, product_id, product_pcs) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contractId}, #{productId}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM basket WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND contract_id = #{contractId} AND product_id = #{productId}
